Definition.WordDefinition: Leakey, TX (city, FIPS 42004) Location: 29.72438 N, 99.76225 W Population (1990): 399 (212 housing units) Area: 1.4 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 78873

Leakey n 1: English paleontologist (son of Louis Leakey and Mary Leakey) who continued the work of his parents; he was appointed director of a wildlife preserve in Kenya but resigned under political pressure (born in 1944) [syn: {Richard Leakey}, {Richard Erskine Leakey}] 2: English paleontologist (the wife of Louis Leakey) who discovered the Zinjanthropus skull that was 1,750,000 years old (1913-1996) [syn: {Mary Leakey}, {Mary Douglas Leakey}] 3: English paleontologist whose account of fossil discoveries in Tanzania changed theories of human evolution (1903-1972) [syn: {Louis Leakey}, {Louis Seymour Bazett Leakey}]
